entities.name: St. Mungo's

relationships.description: Fred and George are working together to eavesdrop on St. Mungo's ward door, as indicated by their joint actions and dialogue.
Harry is given an Extendable Ear to eavesdrop on his father in St. Mungo's ward, indicating a relationship between Harry and the hospital.
Fred is participating in the plan to eavesdrop on St. Mungo's ward door, indicating a relationship between Fred and the hospital.
George is participating in the plan to eavesdrop on St. Mungo's ward door, indicating a relationship between George and the hospital.
